name: The Shimmy
description:
SUMMARY

The Shimmy is an office roguelike where you play as Brenda, a secretary sick of her bosses who is about to do their job herself! Manipulate the company representatives to make deals with them.

GAMEPLAY

Use your Influence to hurt the enemy's Reputation. After it is low enough, the chances to agree to a deal become higher! But remember, you can't make everyone happy...

CREDITS

All assets except font were made by me. Font is "Kurri Island" by Måns Grebäck.

Made under 48 hours for the StartupCities Game Jam. Theme was "A Win-Win Situation."
